sections.heading: of actions; order.The order for consolidation may be made by the court or by a judge thereof in vacation
sections.text: SourceR.S.1867, Code § 151, p. 417;R.S.1913, § 7660;C.S.1922, § 8604;C.S.1929, § 20-704;R.S.1943, § 25-704.AnnotationsAn order of consolidation that was not expressly limited to a particular purp
